column2: King Dagon the "Deep One" of Lobsterland conquered most of New England's coastlines, bringing it under his rule, his conquests having lead to the weaking of christianity. Perhaps his descandents may one day reunite his former Empire.

Maarten van Buren was one of the first Presidents of the Columbian Republican Empire, over hundreds of years ago, who built the Democratic Party. This character is a descendent of him, or at least claims to be one.
